contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 21, 2010 D Brass In Concert
Brass In Concert 0 Entertainments Contest Brass In Concert brass-in-concert
Sage Gateshead, Gateshead, Tyne and Wear, England, UK Don Lusher Trombone Award: Stephen Sykes (Tredegar) Harry Mortimer Best Principal Cornet Award: John Doyle (Leyland) The Fesa Trophy for Best Flugel Award: Sam Fisher (Carlton Main) The Shaw Trophy for Best Soprano Award: Kevin Crockford (Grimethorpe) Best Euphonium: Glyn Williams (Fodens) Best Baritone/Horn: Kristy Rowe (Leyland) John Fletcher Best Basses Award: Rothwell Temperance Best Percussion: Brighouse & Rastrick Best Entertainment Performance: Tredegar Own Choice March: The Wizard (Leyland) Best Soloist: Bravura, Matthew White (Fairey Geneva) New Composition/Arrangement Award: Legends of Cyfarthfa (Matt Hall) - Tredegar Quality of performance: Grimethorpe Winning MD: Allan Withington Youngest Player: Keiron Johnson, aged 13, Reg Vardy
May 21, 2010, 10:11 a.m. Nov. 22, 2010, 12:34 p.m.
1 Grimethorpe Colliery Band Allan Withington
2 Fairey Band Steve Sykes
